headline: 3M: Sales And Profits Are On The Rise
summary: 3M gains with a 90% rebound, steady profits, nine forecast beats, improving margins, and lower year-on-year liabilities. Check out why MMM stock is a hold.

headline: 3M: Operational Excellence And Turnaround Momentum Drive A Buy Rating
summary: 3M drives a turnaround with restructuring, Q3 results, raised EPS, firm margins, solid cash flow and a $178.36 target ahead. Read why MMM stock is a buy.
